attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those of us who have who are suffering severe financial hardship due to our pensions being robbed in the Equitable/GAR debacle call on the government to compensate Equitable Life pensioners and policyholders. This following the damning report by the Parliamentary ombudsman who found the Treasury and FSA guilty of failing to monitor the activities  of Equitable Life which resulted in major losses of pensions and income to policy holders

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
